alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Eaton; Gratiot; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:01PM EDT until August 29 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN INGHAM...EASTERN GRATIOT...CLINTON AND NORTHEASTERN EATON COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Marion Springs to near Henderson to near Lansing, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. These storms have a history of producing damaging winds and power outages. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Mason... St. Johns... Ithaca... East Lansing... Grand Ledge... St. Louis... Williamston... Potterville... Breckenridge... Elsie... Edgemont Park... DeWitt... Eureka... Wheeler... Ovid... Webberville... Dimondale... North Star... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
